item.description:
New Years Eve Singles Dance

Monday Dec, 31, 8 pm. to 1 am.

The Castleton Indian Rock Rd.

Windham NH.   Dress Code: No Blue jeans, No snealers or work boots.

Host: Steve Obermiller  603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Advanced tickets are $20. before Dec. 10th. $25. through Dec 24th. $30. at the door.

Buy tickets: 1-800-688-5644  www.togethernh.com

THIS EVENT IS LISTED WITH 12 OTHER GROUPS. RSVP are incorrect.

Please join Steve Ob1. and friends for an evening of dancing and celebration. at 5:30 pm. for dinner, or just for the Dance at 8 pm.. This will be the largest Singles Dance in this area with between 300 and 400 singles attending. The Castleton has the largest dance floor, and the largest verity of people and ages as you will find anywhere. They will be serving Hors d 'oeuvres the first hour on the evening.  So, please get there as early as you can. Steve Ob1. will do his best to try an introduce you to everyone at our tables. If you are late? introductions become very difficult. Because there is no one at out tables to introduce you too. They are all up dancing. So, please get there as early as possible. Also, if late, the parking lots have only around 250 cars parking spots, and with almost 400 singles attending, bring your walking shoes, if late. Cause late people will be parking a good distance from the Dance.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Steve Ob1. or Meetup at the door as you pay, & the Meetup signs on our tables.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: New Years Eve Singles Dance
